component.name: sObjectLayouts
component.description: Returns a list of layouts and descriptions, including for actions for a specific object.

component.name: compactLayouts
component.description: Returns a list of compact layouts for multiple objects.

component.name: sObjectCompactLayouts
component.description: Returns a list of compact layouts for a specific object.

component.name: sObjectNamedLayouts
component.description: Retrieves information about alternate named layouts for a given object.

component.name: globalSObjectLayouts
component.description: To return descriptions of global publisher layouts.

component.name: sObjectApprovalLayouts
component.description: Returns a list of approval layouts for a specified object

component.name: sObjectApprovalLayoutsForSpecifiedApprovalProcess
component.description: Returns an approval layout for a named approval process on a specified object.

component.name: headersForSObjectApprovalLayouts
component.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectApprovalLayouts operation

component.name: headersForSObjectApprovalLayoutsForSpecifiedApprovalProcess
component.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectApprovalLayoutsForSpecifiedApprovalProcess operation

component.name: headersForSObjectCompactLayouts
component.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectCompactLayouts operation

component.name: headersForSObjectLayouts
component.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectLayouts operation

component.name: sObjectLayoutsForObjectWithMultipleRecordTypes
component.description: Retrieves lists of page layouts and their descriptions for objects that have more than one record type defined.

component.name: headersForSObjectLayoutsForObjectWithMultipleRecordTypes
component.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectLayoutsForObjectWithMultipleRecordTypes operation

component.name: headersForGlobalSObjectLayouts
component.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the globalSObjectLayouts operation
